# Federico Moretti AKA “fedtti”

> Software developer with a strong foundation in programming, developed through
self-directed learning from the early ’90s. Brings over 5 years of recent
experience delivering web-based solutions using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript,
primarily in the BPO sector. Demonstrates proficiency in agile development
methodologies, cross-functional collaboration, and stakeholder engagement.
Focused on streamlining workflows, mitigating project risks, and aligning
technical execution with broader business goals to drive measurable outcomes.
